titles.title: Pro Competition Cargo Allocation Act of 1988

A bill to amend the Merchant Marine Act, to repeal the requirements both for additional cargo perference imposed on certain agricultural exports and for allocations of a share of such exports to Great Lakes ports.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.

bill.summary: 4/28/1988--Introduced. Pro Competition Cargo Allocation Act of 1988 - Amends the Merchant Marine Act, 1936 to repeal various provisions relating to cargo preference shipping requirements for certain agricultural exports, including provisions relating to preserving the percentage share or metric tonnage of certain commodities of waterborne cargoes exported from Great Lakes ports.
